_header: The sun is brighter than the moon
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of; translations
_description: In praise of the Virgin Mary — four lines translating ‘Sol luna lucider’

OxfBal230.Transcription:
Þe sonne is brithere þane þe moneþe mone
                    þane þe stereþe louerd þat alle þinge
                    yschopmakede his moder herre
OxfBal230.Note:
Translating ‘Sol luna lucidior…’ which precedes
                    it.
OxfBal230.Editions:
Mynors,  Roger Aubrey Baskerville,
                        ed.  
             Catalogue of Manuscripts in Balliol College Library.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1962: 241.
